sourcesContent:
import { Container } from '../../style'; const TeacherRemoval = () => { return (

It is important to note that when a teacher is removed from the platform, he/she is no longer allowed to apply again. With this, we have created a list of cases that we want you to know to avoid complications.

 

Repeated Violations

Here are some of the violations that will warrant restriction or removal if done multiple times:

  • Violating our{' '} enrollment management policies , including but not limited to:Not attending class
    • Not attending class
    • Failure to contact the parents and reschedule after missing a class.
    • Starting or ending the class 10 minutes early or late.
    • Canceling a class without notifying the enrollees 24 hours prior to its start time.
  • Failing to respond to parents’ or learners’ messages
  • Receiving complaints from parents or learners
  • Transacting fees outside of the Tagpros platform
  • Preferential treatment to select learners in the class
  • Unprofessional behavior
  • Violating our other policies:
    • Tagpros Class Criteria
    • Community Standards

 

Here are some of the violations that will warrant immediate restriction or removal:

  • Failing to uphold our{' '} privacy {' '} policies
  • Fraudulent transactions within our platform
  • Combining Outschool classes with other 3rd-party off-platform classes
  • Violation of our{' '} Social Media Behavior {' '} Policy
  • Using offensive, harassing, profane, or derogatory language
  • Violent and offensive actions during the live class
  • Sharing inappropriate links or materials with the students
  • Sharing your teacher’s account with others
  • Coercing learners to share private information

Additionally, to help ensure parents see relevant content, we typically unlist classes if they appear inactive. A class will be unlisted if there are no active or future sections and no new sections have been created in the past 12 months. In the case that a teacher has no active sections of any classes in the last 6 months, all classes may be unlisted. If you have been unlisted solely due to inactivity, simply submit your classes for approval again. Outschool has sole discretion to remove teachers or classes from the platform, with or without prior notice to you.

 

Warnings from violations

If you violate our policies that do not warrant immediate removal, you will be given a warning by our team. Excessive warnings received will lead to teacher removal. Please try to maintain clear communication with Tagpros to ensure that there are no problems with your status as a teacher. Feel free to contact customercare@tagpros.us {' '} if you have any requests or concerns.

); }; export default TeacherRemoval;
